Manhattan's East Side / Roosevelt Island / Tram (9 photos + 7 emails)
Manhattan's East Side / Roosevelt Island / Tram (9 photos + 7 emails)

Views from the Roosevelt Island tram of the Edward Koch Queensboro Bridge/59th Street Bridge, East River, and 1st Avenue traffic; views of Midtown Manhattan skyline from Roosevelt Island; and view of Long Island City with Pepsi Cola sign.
